title: How many scholarships are given in the NTSE? - Quora

response.answer_text: Finally 1000 scholarships are given to the students but the student has to prepare really well for this paper to be amongst 1000 students , as this is one of the most prestigious paper a student of class 10 writes .I would recommend you to prepare well from institutes like Resonance Eduventures that enjoys a great reputation of producing scholars like Kalpit Veerval and Pawan Goyal
At present, the scholarship amount is Rs. 1250 per month for class 11 and 12 and Rs. 2000 per month for undergraduate and above. It is expected to increase in the next few years.
